person.name: Paul E. Koelliker
person.description: Elder Paul E. Koelliker was called to serve as a member of the First Quorum of the Seventy of The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints on April 2, 2005, at age 62. He previously served as Executive Director of the Temple Department and as both counselor and president of the Africa Southeast Area. He is currently serving an assistant Executive Director in the Family History Department.
